org.gbif.occurrencestore.persistence.api

Interface DatasetDeletionService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatasetDeletionServiceImpl

    public interface DatasetDeletionService
    Describes a service dedicated to the sole purpose of deleting all occurrences for an entire dataset.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteDataResource(int dataResourceId)
      Deletes the occurrences of the indicated data resource (the legacy dataset identifier from the MySQL portal) as well as any secondary indexes that may be based on them.
      void deleteDataset(UUID datasetKey)
      Deletes the occurrences of the indicated dataset as well as any secondary indexes that may be based on them.

    • Method Detail

      • deleteDataset

        void deleteDataset(UUID datasetKey)
        Deletes the occurrences of the indicated dataset as well as any secondary indexes that may be based on them.
        Parameters:
        datasetKey - the dataset to delete
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails

      • deleteDataResource

        void deleteDataResource(int dataResourceId)
        Deletes the occurrences of the indicated data resource (the legacy dataset identifier from the MySQL portal) as well as any secondary indexes that may be based on them.
        Parameters:
        dataResourceId - the dataset to delete
        Throws:
        org.gbif.api.exception.ServiceUnavailableException - if the underlying data connection fails
